name: Run and Slide
description:
Game introduction:

There are two kinds of blocks, ground and ice.

There is no friction on the ice so player can't change its speed on it.

Leaving moving platforms can get extra momentum. 

Make the best of them to increase your speed and jump distance. 

Avoid the spike and get in the door to unlock new levels.

Control: 

Left and Right arrow keys: Run

Down arrow key: Crouch

 z: Change the temperature to control long blocks

r: Reset
